actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines

official_title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991, relating to the I-35 High Priority Corridor from Laredo, Texas, to Duluth, Minnesota.

summary.text: Amends the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 (105 Stat. 2032), with respect to I-35 High Priority Corridor from Laredo, Texas, to Duluth, Minnesota, to specify the connection from Wichita, Kansas, to Sioux City, Iowa, which includes: (1) I-135 from Wichita, Kansas to Salina, Kansas; (2) United States Route 81 from Salina, Kansas, to Norfolk, Nebraska; (3) Nebraska State Route 35 from Norfolk to South Sioux City, Nebraska; and (4) the connection to I-29 in Sioux City, Iowa.

titles.title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991, relating to the I-35 High Priority Corridor from Laredo, Texas, to Duluth, Minnesota.
